title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.12 - Speed limits
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 654.12 - Speed limits

State Regulations

Subject to the provision of section
654.7
of this Part, no vehicle
shall be operated in excess of the following rates of speed: (a) 30 miles per hour in or upon the
bridges, (b) 10 miles per hour when
approaching the toll zones. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
654.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
